data.actual_result: You can see their actual status (online, idle, do not disturb)
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to see their status. They should appear as offline
data.short_description: The blocked users' status (online, idle, do not disturb, invisible, offline) appears in the Blocked Users list
data.steps_to_repro: - Block someone - Make sure they are online, idle, or on the do not disturb status - Go to Freinds > Blocked users section - Observe the status of the blocked user
